title: Unconquered: Volume One
description: Purya, a virginal princess, is left alone after her ancient and glorious city falls to invaders. But much to her surprise the handsome commander of the opposing army is not done conquering and with great passion he shows Purya a world of sexual pleasure and freedom she never could have dreamed of. Now Purya is caught between her obligations to her family, and her own personal desires as she discovers life in a new conquered world.
author: Breita Seek
